Name: Yuuki
About the game: FULL DISCLOSURE - I'm absolutely counting on player feedback to help with new ideas. I'm at my wits end. Yuuki is a raising simulation game. You have been tasked with looking after an orphaned foxgirl from the Beastkin race for a few months. However, it is clear they don't think much of her, and her prospects for the future are bad... Can you take this child and help her turn things around in just a few short months? What kind of future will you help her achieve? Teach her various skills; including Archery, Crafts, and Cooking. Impart knowledge on first aid, herbology, and looking after a forest. Help her learn interpersonal relationships through jobs and friendships. Let her fight in the arena? Can do! It has state of the art magic technology to keep participants safe. Help her overcome herself and gain the confidence to seize control of her future. A cute and heartfelt story, with fluffy tails and headpats. This is an early access title. Since I want to get feedback on what players want adding. Made with RPGMAKER VX ACE Resolution: 1280x720
